author: Emma O
title: Lovely hotel, Fantastic Location. - Review
text:
Any staff members that we came across were very friendly, the hotel itself is of modern decor and very clean. In the lobby you'll find a bar, some Apple Mac's(free to use) and a touch screen games table for children.
The room had only been refurbished a month ago so was in fab condition. Lovely shower, bed and coffee maker. The only downside is the sink is next to the bed and we didn't like the mirrored toilet door!
We specifically looked for a hotel with a car park there were plenty of spaces and cost Â£25 overnight.
I would definitely return and recommend this to others.
